title: 98 - 5 Things We Got Right
description:
Breaking down our recent '5 Things We Got Right' article, in this episode we tackle this year in crypto from a high level. We cover the predictions we made, what we planned to look out for, and then we dive into how it all played out.

There were some things we got rightâ€”and some things that surprised usâ€”but perhaps most of all, we learned a ton.

Come reflect with us on all the lessons from 2021 that we can arm ourselves with as we head into 2022. Will it be another bullish year?
